title: It’s good fun, but TikTok’s ‘girl maths’ could leave women worse off
description: Pay for your daily coffee with cash instead of a credit card? In the realm of girl maths, it’s practically free, but does it normalise poor financial decisions?

author: Nilendu Brahma
title: Famous TikToker Hospitalized After a Terrifying 80-Foot Drop Onto Scorching Rocks
description: Caleb Coffee is a famous face right now in the world of TikTok. This 18-year-old TikToker is from California and currently has over 10 million subscribers. He first made his name on another video-sharing app called Vine in 2014. author: Hilary Pollack
title: The Best Upgrades for Your Home Coffee Bar
description: We take you through the essential espresso machines, grinders, and others accessories you’ll need to achieve third-wave coffee perfection at home.

author: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (Jada Jones)
title: Amazon's dentist-approved £25 teeth whitening solution hailed a 'game changer' amid claims it erases yellow stains and marks from tea, coffee and smoking
description: "I bought this and after 3 weeks I noticed my teeth were a lot less yellow. I recommended it to my mum who tried some of mine and after 2 weeks her teeth colour had lifted a lot. Thank you for giving back two women their smile."

author: Lawrence Bonk
title: Fans are adapting 'Twin Peaks' into a PS1-style adventure game, and there's a demo
description: You may have watched the original run of Twin Peaks so many times that you exclaim “damn fine coffee” each and every time you grab a cup, but have you ever played the story through the eyes of FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper? You’ll soon be able to do just that via the magic of video games. A small French developer called Blue Rose Team has been prepping Twin Peaks: Into the Night for a while now, and it just dropped a demo of the fan-made game.The graphics are retro and decidedly PS1-flavored, which makes sense given how the show premiered in 1990. The gameplay looks to be full of...

author: Chip Chick
title: He Went On A Date With A Girl Who Was Dressed In A Gross T-Shirt And Covered In Cat Hair, But The Date Was So Bad He Asked Her To Pay Him Back For The Coffee He Bought Her
description: This guy recently went out on an absolutely awful first date with a girl, and he’s been wondering how other people feel about paying on the first date if things start going south. To clarify, he doesn’t mean a date that didn’t work out because you found out you were not on the same page […]

author: Kay Rich
title: History Café returns Aug. 30 with program on ‘Old Sterling’
description: The monthly program, History Café, will resume on Wednesday, Aug. 30 at 10:30 a.m. in the High Plains Education Center at the Overland Trail Museum with coffee, muffins and history! The topic this month will begin the year-long theme of “Crossroads”, as the museum anticipates the Smithsonian exhibit with the same name which will arrive […]

author: Chelsea Ritschel
title: Influencer Caleb Coffee hospitalised with ‘spinal fracture’ after falling off cliff in Hawaii
description: Influencer suffered spinal fracture, broken femur, elbow and wrist, his sister said

author: James Crowley
title: Caleb Coffee: 5 Things To Know About The TikTok Star, 18, Who Survived Falling Onto Lava Rocks
description: The teen TikToker revealed that he didn't break his neck or spine, and he said that he was thankful to be alive.

author: Nicholas McEntyre
title: TikTok star Caleb Coffee falls ‘60 to 80’ feet off cliff onto lava rocks in Hawaii
description: Coffee's father Jason revealed that his son was diagnosed with a broken femur, a fractured wrist, and received two plates and 10 screws in his right elbow while maintaining full motion in his fingers and toes.

author: James Verniere
title: ‘Landscape with Invisible Hand’ so-so sci-fi
description: Although someone describes the Vuvv as resembling “gooey coffee tables,” the truth is they resemble plucked turkeys more than anything else (and so does the movie).

author: Hilary Pollack
title: Basket Case: What to Buy at YETI, According to Our Editors
description: We’ve sipped hot coffee and ice cold beer across the country to bring you this definitive list of YETI’s greatest coolers, mugs, and water bottles.

author: Shannon Thaler
title: Starbucks manager who claims she was fired for being white awarded another $2.7M
description: Starbucks was ordered to pay Shannon Phillips $2.7 million, meaning the former regional manager has received a total of nearly $30 million for being wrongfully cut loose by the coffee giant.

author: Slim Randles
title: Home Country: It beats the alternative
description: Ran into Doc down at The Mule Barn the other day, so naturally we had to rid the world of about a gallon of coffee and solve the world’s problems for an hour. It is the duty of all true Americans of our age, you know. Doc said he’d been aching a little bit lately. […]

author: BusinessWorld
title: Trash to treasure: Indonesian firm turns plastic into bricks
description: JAKARTA – Ovy Sabrina fights plastic waste in Indonesia by spreading noodle packets, coffee sachets, straws and other trash around the sprawling archipelago – entombed in eco-friendly bricks. Her family knows not to stand in her way on environmental issues, especially five years ago when she came up with the idea of making bricks using […]

author: toakes
title: Dunkin’ to Launch Adult Beverages in 12 States…
